name: Chain of Fools
overview: Chain of Fools is a program wherein you are asked to add to it, copy it, then pass it on to your friends. A Chain is a multiple-choice vocabulary test with 10 words and as many definitions as there are foolers who have added to the chain. Only one of the choices is right. The others have been made up by those before you on the chain. Chances are you won't know the meaning of many or any of the words. Game created by Fender Tucker and released on Loadstar #099.
